definition.featurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="feature_container" x="332" y="65"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_huge_fungus"><field name="planted">TRUE</field><comment h="99" pinned="false" w="243">This block represent a crimson fungus, like the ones found in the Crimson Forest biome.This feature should be added during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="stem"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.MUSHROOM_STEM</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the stem of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="hat"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlueMycenaeBlock</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the hat (or "leaves") of the fungus</comment></block></value><value name="decor"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlueMycenaeHanging</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the decorative block that can appear inside the fungus cap</comment></block></value><value name="ground"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlueMossyStone</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the valid ground for the fungus. It cannot generate on other blocks</comment></block></value><value name="replaceable_blocks"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">replaceable_by_trees</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count_on_every_layer"><comment h="101" pinned="false" w="207">This placement type works best for Nether biomes. We generate the huge fungus 8 times on each vertical layer, so that we have a proper forest at any height</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">6</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the fungi don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
